short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ask John anything about the current web page you are reading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ask John: Your Personal AI Web Companion.
Discover a whole new way to surf the web with "Ask John" – your go-to AI tool for all your webpage queries. Unlock the full potential of your browsing experience with our intelligent Chrome extension, designed to answer your every question about the webpage you're exploring.

Ever come across confusing, unclear, or complex information on a webpage? Just "Ask John". Our extension uses cutting-edge AI technology to understand and interpret your queries, providing instant, comprehensible answers that improve your understanding.

"Ask John" fits effortlessly into your browsing experience. Click on our icon in your browser toolbar, type your question, and let our AI handle the rest. It’s like having a knowledgeable companion, always ready to assist you.

We value your privacy. Ask John doesn't save your browsing history or your questions history at any time.
